titles.title: A bill for the relief of Marcela Silva do Nascimento.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/20/2005--Introduced. Declares Marcela Silva do Nascimento eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
